tests.name: Task 1: Variables and Data Types
tests.run: npx jest --testNamePattern 'Task 1: Variables and Data Types'

tests.name: Task 1.1: should have a variable named 'name'
tests.run: npx jest --testNamePattern 'should have a variable named "name"'

tests.name: Task 1.2: should have a variable named 'age'
tests.run: npx jest --testNamePattern 'should have a variable named "age"'

tests.name: Task 1.3: should have a variable named 'isStudent'
tests.run: npx jest --testNamePattern 'should have a variable named "isStudent"'

tests.name: Task 2.1: should check if age is greater than or equal to 18
tests.run: npx jest --testNamePattern 'should check if age is greater than or equal to 18'

tests.name: Task 2.2: should check if the person is a student
tests.run: npx jest --testNamePattern 'should check if the person is a student'

tests.name: Task 3.1: should print numbers from 1 to 5
tests.run: npx jest --testNamePattern 'should print numbers from 1 to 5'

tests.name: Task 3.2: should print numbers from 5 to 1 in reverse
tests.run: npx jest --testNamePattern 'should print numbers from 5 to 1 in reverse'

tests.name: Task 4.1: should calculate the square of a number
tests.run: npx jest --testNamePattern 'should calculate the square of a number'

tests.name: Task 5.1: should have an array named 'fruits'
tests.run: npx jest --testNamePattern 'should have an array named "fruits"'

tests.name: Task 5.2: should check the length of the fruits array
tests.run: npx jest --testNamePattern 'should check the length of the fruits array'
